attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose that the 2nd Home Allowance that PMs enjoy should be abolished altogether and not replaced by any other scheme either.  No other worker that has to work in the City and lives outside of the City can expect his employer to buy, subsidise or give allowances for the 2nd home.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
